/*!
 * Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation.
 * All rights reserved. See LICENSE in the project root for license information.
 */ /**
 * Http specific errors
 */export class HttpException extends Error{/**
     * Error class for representing server errors
     * @param code HTTP status code
     * @param message Http status message
     */constructor(code,message){super(message);this.statusCode=code;this.name=HttpException.Name;// As of Typescript 2.1 if we extend the Error object the prototype must be set explicitly
// See: https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript-wiki/blob/master/Breaking-Changes.md#extending-built-ins-like-error-array-and-map-may-no-longer-work
Object.setPrototypeOf(this,HttpException.prototype);}}HttpException.Name='HttpException';
